org.apache.cordova

类 CordovaInterfaceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cordova.CordovaInterfaceImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CordovaInterface

    public class CordovaInterfaceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CordovaInterface
    Default implementation of CordovaInterface.

      Routes the result to the awaiting plugin.

      Dispatches any pending onActivityResult callbacks and sends the resume event if the Activity was destroyed by the OS.

      Called when a message is sent to plugin.

      Sends a permission request to the activity for one permission.

      Sends a permission request to the activity for a group of permissions

      Call this from onCreate() so that any saved startActivityForResult parameters will be restored.

      Set the plugin to be called when a sub-activity exits.

      Call this from your startActivityForResult() overload.

    • 方法详细资料

      • startActivityForResult

        public void startActivityForResult(CordovaPlugin command,
                                   android.content.Intent intent,
                                   int requestCode)
        从接口复制的说明: CordovaInterface
        Launch an activity for which you would like a result when it finished. When this activity exits, your onActivityResult() method will be called.
        指定者:
        startActivityForResult 在接口中 CordovaInterface
        参数:
        command - The command object
        intent - The intent to start
        requestCode - The request code that is passed to callback to identify the activity

      • setActivityResultCallback

        public void setActivityResultCallback(CordovaPlugin plugin)
        从接口复制的说明: CordovaInterface
        Set the plugin to be called when a sub-activity exits.
        指定者:
        setActivityResultCallback 在接口中 CordovaInterface
        参数:
        plugin - The plugin on which onActivityResult is to be called

      • getActivity

        public android.app.Activity getActivity()
        从接口复制的说明: CordovaInterface
        Get the Android activity.
        指定者:
        getActivity 在接口中 CordovaInterface
        返回:
        the Activity

      • onMessage

        public java.lang.Object onMessage(java.lang.String id,
                                  java.lang.Object data)
        从接口复制的说明: CordovaInterface
        Called when a message is sent to plugin.
        指定者:
        onMessage 在接口中 CordovaInterface
        参数:
        id - The message id
        data - The message data
        返回:
        Object or null

      • getThreadPool

        public java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService getThreadPool()
        从接口复制的说明: CordovaInterface
        Returns a shared thread pool that can be used for background tasks.
        指定者:
        getThreadPool 在接口中 CordovaInterface

      • onCordovaInit

        public void onCordovaInit(PluginManager pluginManager)
        Dispatches any pending onActivityResult callbacks and sends the resume event if the Activity was destroyed by the OS.

      • onActivityResult

        public boolean onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                                int resultCode,
                                android.content.Intent intent)
        Routes the result to the awaiting plugin. Returns false if no plugin was waiting.

      • setActivityResultRequestCode

        public void setActivityResultRequestCode(int requestCode)
        Call this from your startActivityForResult() overload. This is required to catch the case where plugins use Activity.startActivityForResult() + CordovaInterface.setActivityResultCallback() rather than CordovaInterface.startActivityForResult().

      • onSaveInstanceState

        public void onSaveInstanceState(android.os.Bundle outState)
        Saves parameters for startActivityForResult().

      • restoreInstanceState

        public void restoreInstanceState(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Call this from onCreate() so that any saved startActivityForResult parameters will be restored.

      • onRequestPermissionResult

        public void onRequestPermissionResult(int requestCode,
                                      java.lang.String[] permissions,
                                      int[] grantResults)
                               throws org.json.JSONException
        Called by the system when the user grants permissions
        参数:
        requestCode -
        permissions -
        grantResults -
        抛出:
        org.json.JSONException

                              int requestCode,
                              java.lang.String permission)
        从接口复制的说明: CordovaInterface
        Sends a permission request to the activity for one permission.
        指定者:
        requestPermission 在接口中 CordovaInterface

        从接口复制的说明: CordovaInterface

      • hasPermission

        public boolean hasPermission(java.lang.String permission)
        从接口复制的说明: CordovaInterface
        Check for a permission. Returns true if the permission is granted, false otherwise.
        指定者:
        hasPermission 在接口中 CordovaInterface
